data.title: Great Burgers
data.text: One of the better burgers on the Coast.  Its a bar and while they have some seating, its not the type a place you go on a date.  But if your looking for a great burger with a awesome cold beer, this downtown joint is a great place to stop.  Lots of locals and parking isnt as bad as it is closer to Hwy 49.

data.title: Clean and Good Service
data.text: Best Bar on the Coast by far. Always good entertainment, staff is friendly and eager to serve, and it's always clean inside. We would go more often if we could.
